NewsItem.HEADLINE: Fixed Wireless Access 2019
NewsItem.SUMMARY: In-depth economic analysis of various FWA options such as 802.11, LTE, and 5G for rural and urban scenarios. The five-year forecast includes clear breakdowns of the global market, covering CPE and infrastructure from low bands to mm-wave.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: In-depth economic analysis of various FWA options such as 802.11, LTE, and 5G for rural and urban scenarios. The five-year forecast includes clear breakdowns of the global market, covering CPE and infrastructure from low bands to mm-wave.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: FWA Fixed Wireless Access Broadband Forecast WiFi LTE 5G millimeter mmwave cost to connect cost to pass
